solution_line_template: Each minute last {seconds_per_minute} seconds, so that means for the fries to be fully cooked Bill needs to cook them for {recommended_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}=<<{recommended_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}={total_required_seconds}>>{total_required_seconds} seconds

Since Bill had the fries in the oven for {cooked_seconds} seconds so far, that means they need to stay in the oven for another {total_required_seconds}-{cooked_seconds}= <<{total_required_seconds}-{cooked_seconds}={remaining_seconds}>>{remaining_seconds} seconds.
